If there's a plot, there's a process.

This blog uncovers how to get from source data to a finished analysis. For it is easy to simply say the name of a source of data without explaining which data set and which program one used to arrive at a conclusion that is worth sharing among others.

This is the personal blog of Peter Maximilian "Max Fortune" Fortunato.
